title: Union renewal: a view from Europe

references.title: Beyond Individualism.
references.raw: Piore, M. (1995) Beyond Individualism. Cambridge: Harvard UP.

references.title: Bureaucracy and Democracy in Labor Unions‘,
references.raw: Herberg, W. (1943) ‘Bureaucracy and Democracy in Labor Unions‘, Antioch Review 3: 405-17.

references.title: European Trade Unions: Coping with Globalisation’
references.raw: Dølvik, J.E. (2003) ‘European Trade Unions: Coping with Globalisation’ in J. Hoffmann (ed.), The Solidarity Dilemma: Globalisation, Europeanisation and the Trade Unions. Brussels: ETUI, 83-118.

references.title: Le pouv oir syndical dans l’économie mondiale’,
Le pouvoir syndical dans l’économie mondiale’,

references.title: Leadership Matters: An Introduction‘
references.raw: Barker, C., Johnson, A. and Lavalette, M. (2001) ‘Leadership Matters: An Introduction‘ in C. Barker, A. Johnson and M. Lavalette (eds) Leadership and Social Movements. Manchester: Manchester University Press, 1-23.

references.title: Resources and Resourcefulness: Strategic Capacity in the Unionization of California’,
references.raw: Ganz, M. (2000) ‘Resources and Resourcefulness: Strategic Capacity in the Unionization of California’, American Journal of Sociology 105: 1003-62.

references.title: Rethinking Industrial Relations: Mobilisation, Collectivism and Long Waves.
references.raw: Kelly, J. (1998) Rethinking Industrial Relations: Mobilisation, Collectivism and Long Waves. London: Routledge.

references.title: Selections from Political Writings,
references.raw: Gramsci, A. (1977) Selections from Political Writings, 1910-1920. London: Lawrence and Wishart.

references.title: Shop Stewards in Action.
references.raw: Batstone, E., Boraston, I. and Frenkel, S. (1977) Shop Stewards in Action. Oxford: Blackwell.

references.title: The Brave New World of European Labor: European Trade Unions at the Millennium.
references.raw: Martin, A. and Ross, G. (1999) The Brave New World of European Labor: European Trade Unions at the Millennium. New York: Berghahn.

references.title: The New Men of Power.
references.raw: Mills, C.W. (1948) The New Men of Power. New York: Harcourt, Brace.

references.title: Two Logics of Collective Action’,
references.raw: Offe, C. and Wiesenthal, H. (1985) ‘Two Logics of Collective Action’, in C. Offe, Disorganized Capitalism. Cambridge: Polity, 170-220.

references.title: Understanding European Trade Unionism: Between Market, Class and Society.
references.raw: Hyman, R. (2001) Understanding European Trade Unionism: Between Market, Class and Society. London: Sage.

references.title: Working for Ford.
references.raw: Beynon, H. (1973) Working for Ford. Harmondsworth: Penguin.
